name: Sharky.fi
introduce: Sharky.fi is a escrow-less NFT lending protocol connects NFT Holders with Lenders. Anyone can make a loan offer for NFTs in a collection and NFT holders can “left-click-borrow” to receive cash instantly. Users can lend $SOL to earn a high APY (Annual Percentage Yield) and borrow $SOL against their NFTs as collateral instantly. The platform provides a mutually beneficial arrangement for the borrowers and lenders.
